name: Retrieve list of Customer Credit Applications in Progress with invalid Data

testSteps.description: Given I logged into the API earlier
And I have confirmed a Customer with a cif Key "0100000930019836000"

When I call the view Customer Credit Applications in Progress API for CIF Key <cifKey>
| cifKey |
| 1506 |
Then I should receive an Forbidden Erroror
